        Parameters:

        setSprite - load sprite of piece if true, do not load if false

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(boolean isWhite,
                     int id)
        Set the piece this Square should have based on the color and id of the piece to be created
        Parameters:
        isWhite - true for white, false for black
        id - the ID of the piece that does not include color (1-6)

      • setPiece

        public void setPiece(int id)
        Set the piece this Square should have based on the id number of the piece (1-6 for white, 7-12 for black)
        Parameters:
        id - the of the Piece to be added to the Square (1-12)
